Description: Ostracon (?), fragment of the shoulder and upper-body of a brown pottery ribbed vessel, the interior is covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a brown slip and faint traces of one line of red-painted Coptic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394871) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394871)
